newsitem.title: USA: Yields edge up on Bond Buyer's weekly indices.
newsitem.headline: Yields edge up on Bond Buyer's weekly indices.

text.p: Yields on the Bond Buyer municipal bond indices edged up this week.
The yield on the 20-bond index of general obligation bonds calculated Thursday, August 22, was 5.75 percent, up one basis point from last Thursday.
The yield on the 11-bond index of GO bonds was 5.66 percent, also up one basis point from last Thursday.
The yield on the 30-year revenue bond index was 6.00 percent, up two basis points from last Thursday.
